text:
Fun fact. I included this (blurry) photo of a portrait I saw in a local restaurant in my #VDC19 talk;  many Western attitudes about fun start with Calvin, and Calvin was from(ish) Geneva.
I did wonder why a restaurant had a random picture of Calvin. Turns out it's a beer brand. https://t.co/AkayJb2m0I

author.description: @RedHat - Senior Principal Software Engineer, working on @QuarkusIO. Ex-IBM. Java Champion, developer, author, #cloud surfer and maker. My views are my own.
author.name: Holly Cummins (holly_cummins@hachyderm.io)
